definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><variables><variable type="Number" id="xRadius">xRadius</variable><variable type="Number" id="zRadius">zRadius</variable><variable type="Number" id="degree">degree</variable><variable type="Number" id="x_pos">x_pos</variable><variable type="Number" id="y_pos">y_pos</variable><variable type="Number" id="z_pos">z_pos</variable></variables><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="85" y="70"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="projectile_shoot_from_entity"><value name="projectile"><block type="projectiles_arrow"><field name="projectile">CUSTOM:FlowerProjectile</field><field name="fire">FALSE</field><field name="particles">FALSE</field><field name="pickup">DISALLOWED</field><value name="damage"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">DIVIDE</field><value name="A"><block type="variables_get_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="true" has_entity="true"></mutation><field name="VAR">global:currentOutput</field><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">7</field></block></value></block></value><value name="knockback"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">4</field></block></value><value name="piercing"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">25</field></block></value><value name="shooter"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="speed"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">5</field></block></value><value name="inaccuracy"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value></block></next></block></xml>
